enterprises across industries to reimagine business models, accelerate innovation, and maximize 
growth by harnessing digital technologies. As a digital transformation partner to more than 700 
clients, LTIMindtree brings extensive domain and technology expertise to...

messages.message:
Hi Ritwik Raha, I saw your profile and was interested in your . Your experience with  might align with an opportunity we have.

I'm reaching out because we're hiring for a Software Engineer, ML Research position at Windsurf (Codeium), a Forbes AI 50 company building AI-powered developer tools. 

The role focuses on training LLMs for code generation and offers $140-300k + equity in Mountain View, CA (or remote).

Would you be available for a quick call to learn more?
